Description: You awake in a cabin, you vision seems too blury to make out distinct details so you must rely on your other senses to leave.

Rooms.Name: Living Room
Rooms.Description: A large wooden room, the floor is covered in a big carpet with a couch in the corner and a locked door to leave through.

StaticItems.Name: Vase
Description: Its smooth and cold to the touch.
StaticItems.Smell: It doesnt smell like much but a hint of dust.

StaticItems.Name: Cabnet
Description: I can feel the wood outline and the smooth glass covering the china. seems to be locked with no way to open.
StaticItems.Taste: the glass doesnt taste like much.

StaticItems.Name: Couch
Description: Soft and velvet to the touch.

StaticItems.Name: Exit
StaticItems.Reference: Exit door : The door to leave
Description: The large wooden door leads outside with a lock in the handle. the shape of the lock is circular... intesting. feels like my way out of here... and wood.
the door cracks open after the shard slides in!
StaticItems.Smell: I can smell the fresh air outside.
StaticItems.Taste: I cant wait to eat when im out of here.

StaticItems.Name: Key
Description: its cold and a nine is engraved in its base.

StaticItems.Name: Disk
Description: Feels of well polished stone and its emitting a ear pearcing pitch.
StaticItems.Taste: Yeah right, like i'd lick that.

StaticItems.Name: Chest
StaticItems.Reference: Chest : A wooden chest with a lock
Description: Rough corse wood underneath my fingertips, a smooth metal lock with a 9 engraved in it rests at the center.
The now opened chest i can feel a glass ball covered in dust sitting in the center of the chest

Inside the chest you gently pick up the ball, it glows with a warm touch in your hand and suddenly... it explodes in your hand, leaving thousands of cuts in your hand leaving a distinct circular shard on the ground.
StaticItems.Taste: It has a taste of pine and splinters... owie.

StaticItems.Name: Glass
StaticItems.Reference: Glass : A shard of glass from the ball
Description: Sharp to the touch, I should be gentle with this.
